. Ryan Gosling and Rachel McAdams lead all couples for their performance in the 2004 movie`` The Notebook.'' They won 14 percent of the vote, four percent more than runner-ups Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie in the 2005's Mr. and Mrs. Smith. The other couples on the list were, in order: Richard Gere and Julia Roberts (`` Pretty Woman''); Patrick Swayze and Jennifer Grey (`` Dirty Dancing''); Leonardo DiCaprio and Kate Winslet (`` Titanic'');

All the archaeological sites in Aswan, such as the Temple of Philae, the Unfinished Obelisk, the Island of Kalabsha, the Tombs of the Nomarchs, and Elephantine Island are completely safe,'' Zahi Hawass says. The temples of Edfu and Kom Ombo are also safe. All of the tombs in the Valley of the Kings, Valley of the Queens, Tombs of the Nobles, and the temples of Luxor and Karnak are safe.
